variables.desc: The Neo Geo CD is a home video game console released by SNK in 1994. It was designed to be a more affordable alternative to the Neo Geo AES, which used expensive cartridges. The Neo Geo CD used CD-ROMs, which were much cheaper to produce than cartridges. The console was popular in Japan, but it was not as successful in North America or Europe.

The Neo Geo CD is a home video game console released by SNK in 1995. It was designed to be a more affordable alternative to the Neo Geo AES, which used expensive cartridges. The Neo Geo CD used CD-ROMs, which were much cheaper to produce than cartridges. The console was popular in Japan, but it was not as successful in North America or Europe.

The Neo Geo CD used CD-ROMs, which were much cheaper to produce than cartridges. The console was popular in Japan, but it was not as successful in North America or Europe.

La Neo Geo CD est une console de jeux vidéo domestique commercialisée par SNK en 1994. Elle a été conçue pour être une alternative plus abordable à la Neo Geo AES, qui utilisait des cartouches coûteuses. La Neo Geo CD utilisait des CD-ROM, qui étaient beaucoup moins chers à produire que les cartouches. La console était populaire au Japon, mais elle n'a pas connu le même succès en Amérique du Nord ou en Europe.
